Class BlockWithEntity

java.lang.Object

net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockBehaviour

net.minecraft.world.level.block.BaseEntityBlock
org.cyclops.cyclopscore.block.BlockWithEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.minecraft.world.level.block.EntityBlock, net.minecraft.world.level.ItemLike, net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeBlock, net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlockWithEntityGui
public class BlockWithEntity extends net.minecraft.world.level.block.BaseEntityBlock
Base block with a block entity. By default, the NBT data of block entities will not be persisted, unless enabled via isPersistNbt(). If so, then the getDroppedItemStackNbt(net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState, net.minecraft.world.phys.HitResult, net.minecraft.world.level.BlockGetter, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos, net.minecraft.world.entity.player.Player, net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack, org.cyclops.cyclopscore.blockentity.CyclopsBlockEntity) method will be called to call CyclopsBlockEntity.writeToItemStack(CompoundTag). This NBT data will automatically be read when placing the block.

    • getDroppedItemStack

      protected net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack getDroppedItemStack(net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState state, net.minecraft.world.phys.HitResult target, net.minecraft.world.level.BlockGetter world, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos blockPos, net.minecraft.world.entity.player.Player player, net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack originalItemStack)
      Override this method to modify the stack that is dropped.
      Parameters:
      state - A block state.
      target - The ray trace result.
      world - The world.
      blockPos - The current position.
      player - The player breaking the block.
      originalItemStack - The original stack.
      Returns:
      The modified stack.

    • getDroppedItemStackNbt

      protected net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundTag getDroppedItemStackNbt(net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState state, net.minecraft.world.phys.HitResult target, net.minecraft.world.level.BlockGetter world, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos blockPos, net.minecraft.world.entity.player.Player player, net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack itemStack, CyclopsBlockEntity blockEntity)
      Override this method to modify how NBT is constructed for the item. By default, CyclopsBlockEntity.writeToItemStack(CompoundTag) will be called.
      Parameters:
      state - A block state.
      target - The ray trace result.
      world - The world.
      blockPos - The current position.
      player - The player breaking the block.
      itemStack - The item stack.
      blockEntity - The block entity to serialize.
      Returns:
      The NBT tag that will be added to the item stack.

    • isPersistNbt

      public boolean isPersistNbt()
      If the NBT data of this block entity should be added to the dropped item.
      Returns:
      If the NBT data should be added.
